snippet.title: BLAZE! Love to the Top Official Trailer // FREE BL (Yaoi) Game
snippet.description:
"BLAZE! Love to the Top" is a BL (yaoi) smartphone game by AbracadabraGames.

GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.otomedou.fwe.aikareEn
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/blaze-love-to-the-top/id1318135398

◆ Story ◆
What started as a part-time job ends up
becoming the most exciting adventure
when your boss orders you to become
a member of the idol unit BLAZE!?

Category/Genre: Romance ADV / BL
Age Restrictions: for all ages
Price: Free to Play (in-app purchases)
